scripts.text:
WITH
SQ_SapiensReinsurancePolicy AS (
	SELECT
		SapiensReinsurancePolicyId,
		AuditId,
		CreatedDate,
		ModifiedDate,
		PolicyKey,
		DocumntType,
		AccountingDate,
		MonthlyTotalDirectWrittenPremium,
		ProductCode,
		StrategicProfitCenterAbbreviation,
		AccountingProductCode,
		InsuranceReferenceLineOfBusinessCode,
		ASLCode,
		SubASLCode,
		PrimaryStateCode,
		CoverageEffectiveDate,
		CoverageExpirationDate,
		EndorsementStartDate,
		EndorsementIssueDate,
		PolicyIssueDate,
		SourceSequenceNumber,
		TransactionNumber,
		EndorsementNumber,
		ASLCoversKey,
		DateKey,
		PremiumMasterCalculationPKId,
		ReinsuranceUmbrellaLayer,
		OSECode,
		PremiumTransactionPKID,
		EntryProcess,
		RatingPlanAbbreviation,
		FirstNameIsured
	FROM SapiensReinsurancePolicy
),
EXP_DataCollect AS (
	SELECT
	SapiensReinsurancePolicyId,
	AuditId,
	CreatedDate,
	ModifiedDate,
	PolicyKey,
	DocumntType,
	AccountingDate,
	MonthlyTotalDirectWrittenPremium,
	ProductCode,
	StrategicProfitCenterAbbreviation,
	AccountingProductCode,
	InsuranceReferenceLineOfBusinessCode,
	ASLCode,
	SubASLCode,
	PrimaryStateCode,
	CoverageEffectiveDate,
	CoverageExpirationDate,
	EndorsementStartDate,
	EndorsementIssueDate,
	PolicyIssueDate,
	SourceSequenceNumber,
	TransactionNumber,
	EndorsementNumber,
	ASLCoversKey,
	DateKey,
	PremiumMasterCalculationPKId,
	ReinsuranceUmbrellaLayer,
	OSECode,
	PremiumTransactionPKID,
	EntryProcess,
	RatingPlanAbbreviation,
	FirstNameIsured
	FROM SQ_SapiensReinsurancePolicy
),
ArchSapiensReinsurancePolicy AS (
	INSERT INTO ArchSapiensReinsurancePolicy
	(AuditId, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, SapiensReinsurancePolicyId, PolicyKey, DocumntType, AccountingDate, MonthlyTotalDirectWrittenPremium, ProductCode, StrategicProfitCenterAbbreviation, AccountingProductCode, InsuranceReferenceLineOfBusinessCode, ASLCode, SubASLCode, PrimaryStateCode, CoverageEffectiveDate, CoverageExpirationDate, EndorsementStartDate, EndorsementIssueDate, PolicyIssueDate, SourceSequenceNumber, TransactionNumber, EndorsementNumber, ASLCoversKey, DateKey, PremiumMasterCalculationPKId, ReinsuranceUmbrellaLayer, OSECode, PremiumTransactionPKID, EntryProcess, RatingPlanAbbreviation, FirstNameIsured)
	SELECT 
	AUDITID, 
	CREATEDDATE, 
	MODIFIEDDATE, 
	SAPIENSREINSURANCEPOLICYID, 
	POLICYKEY, 
	DOCUMNTTYPE, 
	ACCOUNTINGDATE, 
	MONTHLYTOTALDIRECTWRITTENPREMIUM, 
	PRODUCTCODE, 
	STRATEGICPROFITCENTERABBREVIATION, 
	ACCOUNTINGPRODUCTCODE, 
	INSURANCEREFERENCELINEOFBUSINESSCODE, 
	ASLCODE, 
	SUBASLCODE, 
	PRIMARYSTATECODE, 
	COVERAGEEFFECTIVEDATE, 
	COVERAGEEXPIRATIONDATE, 
	ENDORSEMENTSTARTDATE, 
	ENDORSEMENTISSUEDATE, 
	POLICYISSUEDATE, 
	SOURCESEQUENCENUMBER, 
	TRANSACTIONNUMBER, 
	ENDORSEMENTNUMBER, 
	ASLCOVERSKEY, 
	DATEKEY, 
	PREMIUMMASTERCALCULATIONPKID, 
	REINSURANCEUMBRELLALAYER, 
	OSECODE, 
	PREMIUMTRANSACTIONPKID, 
	ENTRYPROCESS, 
	RATINGPLANABBREVIATION, 
	FIRSTNAMEISURED
	FROM EXP_DataCollect
),
